text: Hemipristis is a genus of weasel sharks that lived in Cretaceous to recent. It contains one species: Weasel Shark (Hemipristis elongata). == Species == * Weasel shark (Hemipristis elongata) Klunzinger, 1871 * †Hemipristis curvatus Dames, 1883 * †Hemipristis serra Agassiz, 1835 * †Hemipristis plicatilis Klunzinger, 1871 * †Hemipristis tanakai Tomita et al., 2023 * †Hemipristis intermedia Cicimurri, Ebersole, Stringer, Starnes & Phillips, 2025 * †Hemipristis liui Tao & Hu, 2008 * †Hemipristis sp. Antunes, M.T. & Jonet, S. & Nascimento, A. (1981) == References == Category:Hemipristis Category:Sharks Category:Extinct fish Category:Animals Category:Cretaceous Category:Miocene Category:Pliocene Category:Paleocene Category:Eocene Category:Oligocene
title: Hemipristis
